posts.post_content:
Hello everyone. I have a few T210/T209 for trade. I am looking to hopefully knock off a few want list cards with these extra cards. I am looking for T210/T209/N172 in return. Im not looking to sell any at the moment. My T210 needs are in Series 5, 7, and 8 and 50/4 and above Series 2 cards. Thank you and I hope to make a few fair trades.

T209-2
Lave Cross SGC 10 TRADED
Vickery SGC 20

Hi Jason,

I've got a couple of Old Judges in mind.  What do you value the Cross at?
I would love to talk trades if anyone has interest!
If you decide to sell, I’d love to buy the Dutch Revelle.  I collect Richmond players...Please keep me in mind if you decided to do so.
PS - I live in Richmond also...We could do in person if you decided to sell the Dutch.
Anyone interested in trading some cards this weekend?!
Front and back scans available upon request!
